meaningMnemonic: You've seen 動く hopefully, and know it means <vocabulary>to move</vocabulary>. This is similar to that, but now you're moving something else. You know this because as you go <vocabulary>to move something</vocabulary> the thing you're moving starts to <reading>cuss</reading> (かす) you out because it's angry.
readingMnemonic: The reading for this can come from 動く. If you know that word, you know how to read this word!
